title: Can we use antibacterial, Pepsi, or  any other liquid to remove an impurity? | Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: the third question is using antibacteria to remove impurity is this permissible and an impurity is a physical substance whether you you remove it with pepsi cola with with the fizzies with the juice with um antibacterial as long as it is not existence anymore this does the job it doesn't have to be with water and allah knows best you
